text: Hans von Borsody (20 September 1929 â€“ 4 November 2013Article about Borsodys death in german language at spiegel.de) was a German-Austrian actor. He was born in Vienna as a member of an artists family. His father Eduard von Borsody was a movie director, his uncle Julius von Borsody a set designer. His daughter Suzanne von Borsody is also an actress. von Borsody died on 4 November 2013 in Berlin, Germany from lung cancer, aged 84. ==Some movies== Film Year Title Role Notes 1977 A Bridge Too Far 1967 Massacre in the Black Forest 1966 Omicidio per appuntamento 1965 Buffalo Bill, Hero of the Far West 1963 Bergwind ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Austrian movie actors Category:Austrian television actors Category:Austrian stage actors Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:Actors from Vienna
title: Hans von Borsody
